Module entities
Package entities

Class School

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.School
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class School
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    School class unique attributes for a particular school. It contains a list of Students, list of Staff, list of Courses since these information are unique to each school.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setAccessPeriod

        public boolean setAccessPeriod​(java.lang.String startDate,
                               java.lang.String endDate)
        Tries to set the access period for the school and returns a boolean depending on its success.
        Parameters:
        startDate - , which is the start date for access
        endDate - , which is the end ddate for access
        Returns:
        isValid, whether the access period is valid or not. False if the access period is invalid, and true otherwise.
